The BOOST_PP_LIMIT_ITERATION macro defines the maximum number of local and file iterations.

Usage

BOOST_PP_LIMIT_ITERATION

Remarks

This macro currently expands to 256.

Requirements

Header:  <boost/preprocessor/config/limits.hpp>
